com.android.layoutlib.bridge.impl.binding

Class BaseAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.layoutlib.bridge.impl.binding.BaseAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FakeAdapter, FakeExpandableAdapter

    public class BaseAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
    Base adapter to do fake data binding in AdapterView objects.
